overview: America has been plagued with unspeakable crimes and unexplained phenomena that have captured nationwide attention and intrigue, demanding answers and retribution.  This compelling documentary series presents a countdown of America's 60 most notorious unsolved mysteries and crimes.
tagline: 10-part chronicle covering 7 hours of captivating mysteries including: J.F.K., Apollo 11, Lizzie Borden, D.B. Cooper, Jimmy Hoffa, The Zodiac Killer, Marilyn Monroe, Bigfoot & more!
title: America's 60 Greatest Unsolved Mysteries & Crimes
